channel.title: Buy 1, 5, 10, Changing interface for buy amount [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, just a small question again, gonna try again today.
For a PI where would I change the Buy "1" Buy "5" Buy "10" to say Buy "5" or Buy "100"
I have checked literally everywhere and I cannot find, or figure out where to create a method for these..
Any input would help, thanks!

item.title: Buy 1, 5, 10, Changing interface for buy amount [PI]
item.dc:creator: @projeccct projeccct
item.description:
@projeccct wrote:

I do not need to change the server sided cases, I need to change what the player sees, a.k.a. Buy 10 or Buy 1, not the amount of items you get when you click the button.

Thank you for the reply though.

Read full topic
item.source: Buy 1, 5, 10, Changing interface for buy amount [PI]
